SEARCH
Package com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.core.ports.pipeline.cooldown

Interface CooldownMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageCooldownMap
public interface CooldownMap
A functional interface representing a cooldown check for a given string.

This is used to determine whether a message should be allowed to send, based on the last time it was shown and the configured delay.

  • Method Details

    • notCooling

      boolean notCooling(CooldownKey cooldownKey)
      Determines if the given cooldown string is not currently cooling down.

      Returns true if either no cooldown exists for the string, or the cooldown has expired.

      Parameters:
      cooldownKey - the cooldown string composed of recipient and message identifier
      Returns:
      true if the message is not cooling down and may be shown

    • putExpirationTime

      void putExpirationTime(Recipient.Sendable recipient, FinalMessageRecord messageRecord)
